comments:
Eclipse 3.2R6, CDT 3.1.0.200605151430

I'm not sure exactly what I did, but the last change to the launch configuration I remember was to set the debugger to gdb/mi. Now I get an ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException whenever I open the launch configuration:

I've seen this error when a launch configuration is swapped around and
the same set of debugger identifiers are not available from one host to
another.   

I've "safetied" up the code which was already partially tolerant of this
type of change in StandardGDBDebuggerPage
*** Bug 160359 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Changing OS from Mac OS to Mac OS X as per bug 185991
